pages.text: Iron's Spells 'n Spellbooks is a comprehensive magic mod that brings powerful spells and arcane knowledge to Minecraft. $(br2)Discover spellbooks filled with incantations, harness elemental magic, and become a master wizard!

Start your magical journey by crafting a basic Spellbook and gathering Scrolls from loot chests. $(br2)Combine these Scrolls with spell reagents to unlock new spells, then channel their power through your Spellbook.

Expand your arcane arsenal with elemental magic, healing spells, and more. $(br2)Build a Wizard's Tower to focus your studies, enchant your Spellbook, and seek out the rare Tome of Arcana to discover even more powerful magic. $(br2)The world of wizardry awaits!
